title: Condensed Sans Serif Font - Looks a bit like Tungsten
author: SmallChange

comments.content: Because of /P downer bowl junction, the exact match is the [free for personal use version](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071818/http:/www.dafont.com/bignoodle-titling.font) of [Big Noodle Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071818/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/big-noodle-titling). Alternative: [Primex](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071818/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/primex)
Not sure how I feel about using a free font, but on the other hand, it does look rather good... thanks!
